Docs.summary: Find the optional auxilliary score column to use. If name is specified, that is used. Otherwise, if colScore is part of a score set, this looks in the score set for a column with the given valueKind. If none is found, it returns null.

Docs.summary: Find the score column to use. If name is specified, that is used. Otherwise, this searches for the most recent score set of the given kind. If there is no such score set and defName is specifed it uses defName. Otherwise, it throws.

public static void ReconcileKeyValues (Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView[] views, string columnName);
.method public static hidebysig void ReconcileKeyValues(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView[] views, string columnName) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ReconcileKeyValues (env As IHostEnvironment, views As IDataView(), columnName As String)
static member ReconcileKeyValues : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView[] * string -> unit

Docs.summary: This method takes an array of data views and a specified input key column, and adds a new output column to each of the data views. First, we find the union set of the key values in the different data views. Next we define a new key column for each data view, with the union of the key values as the new key values. For each data view, the value in the output column is the value corresponding to the key value in the original column.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ReconcileSlotNames<T> (Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView[] views, string columnName, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.PrimitiveType itemType, T def = null);

.method public static hidebysig void ReconcileSlotNames<T>(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView[] views, string columnName, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.PrimitiveType itemType, !!T def) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ReconcileSlotNames(Of T) (env As IHostEnvironment, views As IDataView(), columnName As String, itemType As PrimitiveType, Optional def As T = null)
static member ReconcileSlotNames : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView[] * string * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.PrimitiveType * 'T -> unit

Docs.summary: This method takes an array of data views and a specified input vector column, and adds a new output column to each of the data views. First, we find the union set of the slot names in the different data views. Next we define a new vector column for each data view, indexed by the union of the slot names. For each data view, every slot value is the value in the slot corresponding to its slot name in the original column. If a reconciled slot name does not exist in an input column, the value in the output column is def.

static member ReconcileVectorKeyValues : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView[] * string -> unit

Docs.summary: This method is similar to , but it reconciles the key values over vector input columns.
